title: A Live TV OS 2.12 - Bootable Linux Live TV and Movies
description:
* Educational System: A Live TV OS provides linked results for online media
* Enjoy FREE LIVE TV and MOVIE streams!
* Links of found movies,shows,and media are displayed inside OS
* Online video plugins preloaded no need to install anything, or worry about malware again!
* Linux bootable live OS for stability! No HD needed - boot from DVD or USB.
* Justin.TV, Veetle HD, Ad-Block Plus, Firefox and Hulu desktop is already preinstalled.
* Preloaded drivers (To run almost any device). 
* The only OS you need for complete entertainment is here!
